name: PhilipsSonicare
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Dentists recommend replacing your toothbrush every few months because bristles wear out and lose their effectiveness to remove plaque over time

Here is a simple and convenient way to stay on top of your brush head supply: Amazon Alexa will notify you when you need to replace the brush head for your Philips Sonicare toothbrush. You also have the option to set up smart reordering to automatically order and deliver a brush head when you need it.

To use the Philips Sonicare skill:
1. Download the Sonicare app from the Apple App Store or Google Play.
2. Connect a Philips Sonicare toothbrush with Bluetooth®.
3. Set up smart reorders and low supply notifications with Amazon Alexa through the Sonicare app .
